DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._An indication that a medication schedule was modified by subtraction, either by changing the frequency, strength or amount.
